db:abstract.db:para: The QAccessibleTableCellInterface class implements support for the IAccessibleTable2 Cell interface.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] int QAccessibleTableCellInterface::columnExtent() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the number of columns occupied by this cell accessible.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QList<QAccessibleInterface *> QAccessibleTableCellInterface::columnHeaderCells() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the column headers as an array of cell accessibles.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] int QAccessibleTableCellInterface::columnIndex() const
db:section.db:para: Translates this cell accessible into the corresponding column index.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] bool QAccessibleTableCellInterface::isSelected() const
db:section.db:para: Returns a boolean value indicating whether this cell is selected.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] int QAccessibleTableCellInterface::rowExtent() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the number of rows occupied by this cell accessible.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QList<QAccessibleInterface *> QAccessibleTableCellInterface::rowHeaderCells() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the row headers as an array of cell accessibles.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] int QAccessibleTableCellInterface::rowIndex() const
db:section.db:para: Translates this cell accessible into the corresponding row index.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QAccessibleInterface *QAccessibleTableCellInterface::table() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the QAccessibleInterface of the table containing this cell.
